name: New World Horizon
description: New World Horizon is a 16th century role playing stand alone adventure for the PC. It features a massive open world to explore by land and sea for hunting, fishing, mining, lumbering, house construction and farming.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64 bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster. Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
